title: Simple chat app
description: A simple chat application using Python, Pandas, NumPy, Kivy, and Tkinter. It allows multiple users to chat in real-time, store history locally, and customize their interface.

title: Portfolio site
description: My personal portfolio built with React, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Showcases projects, skills, and experiences with interactive components.

title: Smart Home System
description: A home automation system using Python, Flask, and ESP32. Controls lights, sensors, and temperature, with a web interface for monitoring.

title: AI Object Detector
description: An AI-based object detection application using YOLOv8 and OpenCV. Detects objects in images and video streams with real-time annotations.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A dashboard that shows weather forecasts, historical data, and live updates using React, Chart.js, and OpenWeather API.

title: E-commerce Store
description: An online store built with React and Node.js. Includes product listings, shopping cart, checkout process, and order management.
